channel.title: test-infra on KUBEDGE's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in test-infra on KUBEDGE's Blog

item.title: Build and Deploy Kubernetes test-infra
item.description: test-infra seems to somewhat overlap with sonobuoy features. The purpose of this post is to fetch the code, compile and deploy it on a Kubernetes cluster.

item.title: Compile and Test SONOBUOY
item.description: Sonobouy, deploys in a Kubernetes cluster and helps to assesse the compliance of that cluster
